_sText:
mg_smash_mars ... better...harder.crazier !!!!

in the first place i say thx to paul_deagle for insperation.

but...

i wannt a bigger better crazier smashmap.I want mg_smash_mars!!!

the version 3 of mg_smash mars is not final version. im work on the map everyday,
for better gameplay and more fun.

well now need help to improved the map. i search help of other mappers.
the way on plattforms are slower than mg_smash_cannonz need help for fix it.
my conact : ICQ: 172827075 [German]


Gameplay:

-the 2 Terrorists must shoot from cannons at the platforms with the CT's on. After 4 minutes teleport to final battle where the ct must press a button to kill the Terrorits.They shoot with cannons on the Counterterrorits
set the brightness on css highest for optimal graphic. 

Spawns:

-52 Slots

music:

-little Jukebox at terrorits spawn with pendulum music or mute botten.


PS : Suche noch eine Mapper Community, ich bins leid immer alleine zu mappen und zu testen ^^

sry for my bad english xD

Have Fun !!!
